Package com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine

Interface Summary
Consumer A type of actor that receives data from a Provider actor and acts on it
Provider A type of actor that provides data to Consumer actors.
 

Class Summary
Actor With Workflow, forms the basis for a simple workflow engine.
ExecWorkflow A command line program to load a Workflow from an XML configuration file and then begin execution.
Workflow This forms the base of a simple workflow engine.
